description: This three ingredient, quick flatbread base will become your go to for easy pizza night.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Spinach,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Spinach, Mushroom & Blue Cheese Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced and place two baking sheets inside. For the base, whisk the flour and baking powder together in a large bowl.
Pour the yoghurt into the bowl and add 4-5 tbs of water. Mix to form a smooth dough. Tip on to a floured surface and cut into two pieces. Roll each out into a thin 20cm round.
Heat half the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes, add the mushrooms and garlic and cook for 5 more minutes. Add the spinach gradually, cooking until wilted.
Place the dough on the hot baking trays, top with spinach, onion and mushroom mix and crumble over blue cheese. Bake for 12-14 minutes until the dough is golden and the cheese is lightly melted.
